nodes.text: The police glowrod was a type of glowrod used by the police officers of the Canto Bight Police Department to patrol the coastal city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. Unlike normal glowrods, the police glowrods used by the Canto Bight Police Department could double as a crude baton. In addition, instead of a light bulb, the police glowrod had a multi-spectrum illuminator array for crime scene investigations.
